data.description: Please Note: This is a Utah-based hybrid position which will require some regular in-office days each week. Additionally, employment with BambooHR is contingent on passing both a background and credit check. Essential Job Duties As a Software Developer Intern (undergraduate), you will contribute to the current and next generation of our award-winning app on either our Backend or Frontend teams! You’ll be working alongside our incredible engineers, making changes to our live site within a few weeks of your internship (that's right, we release wicked fast!). You’ll be paired with a skilled mentor who will help you develop your skills and make the most of your internship experience. If you get a kick out of solving problems and building beautiful, world-class software, then you will love BambooHR. On the Backend, we design database schemas, create API endpoints, integrate with multiple systems, tame business logic, and product designs into an orderly collection of classes, build tools that help customers, systems administrators, and other engineers. We use PHP, MySQL, C#, SqlServer, and many other technologies in our stack. On the Frontend, we work closely with UX designers, product managers, and our backend software engineers to create a highly polished and interactive frontend in React for our enterprise-level web application. Our stack consists of Webpack, Babel, React, and an abstraction of Material UI within our design system. You will: Practice a scrum-like agile development process using CI/CD systems. Work with a world-class product development team to integrate your projects into the application. Contribute to the ongoing improvement of our systems and processes. Come to work, do great things, then go home! Integrate AI into your daily tasks using IDEs (or plugins) such as Github Copilot and Windsurf. Leverage ChatGPT to streamline your workload by brainstorming and refining ideas, and planning projects. Join our fast-paced team as we innovate at the speed of AI. AI is integrated into our products, development processes, and IDEs. We utilize AI tools like Windsurf, ChatGPT, Claude, Sonnet, Grok, and Gemini in our daily work. This will be a paid, full-time internship (M-F, 8-5), running from May 2026 to August 2026. What You Need to Get the Job Done Experience in an object-oriented programming language (backend) Basic education with web development (frontend) Familiarity with relational databases (backend) Familiarity with version control software, preferably Git You live within commuting distance of our Draper, UT office Excited to integrate AI-powered features into front-end workflows, such as real-time personalized UI elements, dynamic content rendering, or customized chatbot interactions using prompt engineering. What Will Make Us REALLY Love You You can show that you're an excellent communicator We can see that you have a service-minded attitude Experience with multiple programming languages You can show us an awesome capstone project What You'll Love About Us A Great Company Culture that has been recognized by multiple organizations like Inc, and Salt Lake Tribune Paid time off for summer holidays and birthdays 401k plans with up to 6% company match Join us for company events during the summer We pay for a one year subscription to Financial Peace University and you walk away with financial savvy and a bonus About Us At BambooHR, we're building something different: we're building a people intelligence platform that transforms HR and sets people free to do great work! We're a proven market leader driving innovation while building lasting success through thoughtful, sustainable growth. Here, you'll find a place that champions growth: both professional and personal, both individual and collective. We invest in potential, giving you the space to stretch your capabilities and turn good ideas into reality while providing the safety net of a supportive, values-driven culture. Our approach combines meaningful work with meaningful lives, offering competitive benefits, professional development, and the flexibility to thrive both in and outside the office. What sets us apart isn't just what we do, but how we do it: with openness, integrity, and a shared commitment to doing the right thing. Join us in creating HR software that makes work better for everyone, while we make work better for you. BambooHR is committed to the full inclusion of all qualified individuals and will ensure that persons with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodations throughout the hiring process. If you would like to request accommodations, please let your recruiter know. BambooHR is An Equal Opportunity Employer--M/F/D/VBecause our team members are trusted to handle sensitive information, we require all candidates that receive and accept employment offers to complete a background check before being hired. For information on California Privacy Policy, click here. Our process utilizes AI as an assistant to efficiently process and analyze candidate data. Recruiters and hiring managers maintain full oversight and accountability, ensuring that all final selection and rejection decisions are human-made and based solely on objective job qualifications. Please see our General Privacy Notice and California Privacy Notice for more details. See our AI Guidelines for Candidates for details on how BambooHR uses AI in recruiting, how we expect candidates to use AI, and what is not allowed.
